abstract: Looking for a specific type of image like a black and white photo or an illustration when using the image search function of your favorite search engine?
snippet: Looking for a specific type of image like a black and white photo or an illustration when using the image search function of your favorite search engine?
lead_paragraph: Looking for a specific type of image like a black and white photo or an illustration when using the image search function of your favorite search engine? Both Google and Yahoo offer an “advanced image search” option on their respective image search pages; Yahoo’s is under the Options link. Here, you can specify the type and size of the pictures and art you want to see in your results. And Microsoft’s Bing search engine offers a variety of controls to filter your results along the left side of the browser.

headline.main: Tip of the Week: Advanced Image Search on the Web
